== Introduction ==
Zorin OS is a Linux distribution that helps Windows users migrate to Linux with ease by replicating the Windows GUI.
The Zorin OS team used Ubuntu as a base because of it's simplicity.
Zorin OS is aimed at Windows users who want a fast, open-source, reliable and free alternative to Windows although a Mac-like version will be available in the future.

== Contact Information ==
'''Website:''' http://zorin-os.com/

'''Community:''' http://www.zoringroup.com/forum/

'''Email:''' os@zoringroup.com

== Audience ==
Zorin OS is aimed at Windows users who want a fast, open-source, reliable and free alternative to Windows and, in the future, Mac.

== Goals ==
Zorin OS is aimed at being a fast, open-source, reliable and free Linux alternative to Windows and Mac.
